alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 12:55PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mobile and west central Baldwin Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 1255 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Tanner Williams, or 13 miles west of Midtown Mobile, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Saraland, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Spanish Fort, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, I65 And AL 158 and Mobile Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland
